description: The General is a military officer that took the charge of the http://anidb.net/ch92208 [Control], relieving http://anidb.net/ch90363 [L] of his position as a head. He changed the course of the operation Changeling in a way to assassinate http://anidb.net/ch88463 [Princess Charlotte]. However, his plan failed and he was relieved of his position, allowing L to come back.
name: General
